nodes.text: Mazzoney's was a seedy cantina in the city of Selkren on the planet Demophon. Even when the citizens were in a panic to flee the planet before its sun went supernova, Mazzoney's remained open as a den of decadence and corruption. Mazzoney himself tended the bar. The establishment had a reputation for being a place to find information. In case of trouble the cantina was staffed with Gamorrean bouncers. Mazzoney was known to engage in brawls himself, as well.
